attributes.review: First of all when I open the address is it pictures which is the giant orange working out and all the different kinds of stuff I don’t want to see his pig face on my screen second of all the disgusting pictures of this orange and orange what does he use spray tan
attributes.title: He’s the worst president who ever existed

attributes.review: First of all he has the audacity to cancel tiktok like I’m sorry no one likes you we can’t help that’s sounds like a personal problem. Get a life or don’t not my choice. You should really talk to a therapist and also give us Barrón we Stan him and not you he should be the president not you🤢
attributes.title: The audacity👁👄👁

attributes.review: Very racist and disrespectful it says news and update but doesn’t show the news that’s going on right now it’s only shows trump and his “ make America better” like it wasn’t better before he became president. I expect better from this app I don’t do white I do diverse.
attributes.title: Worst app every

attributes.review: i found this app to be so buggy and difficult to use. and plus it never loads anything which gets really annoying.  a few times it even kept crashing multiple times in a row
attributes.title: Horrible UI

attributes.review: So I downloaded this app and it doesn’t seem to work. All it does is display photos of an orange clown and they named it Trump of all things. It’s absolutely hideous and it makes me want to vomit whenever I look at it. This app should seriously be removed as it’s disgraceful to this country and it’s morals.
attributes.title: App issues

attributes.review: I didn’t even open the app and I hate it, like who is “trump” I didn’t even know he existed like who is he because I don’t think that is our president Cheetos cannot be president this is impossible 😒 👁👄👁 but I say get this disgusting thing off my screen please 😌💅🏾
attributes.title: This app is literally the worst🤮

attributes.review: After a month of downloading the app, I finally was able to use it. Once I finally got on it, A WITCH SHOWED UP AT MY DOOR STEP😖. She wrote me a letter in hieroglyphics saying, “trump is a poopy fart head.” So, I done what any reasonable person would do and deleted it🤷‍♂️. Now, because of this app, I have nightmares about trumps wig knocking me into a coma😔.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: This is literally the worst app on the entire app store. I’m serious. it made my phone glitch so bad that i had to take it to the apple store to fix it which cost me $200. The second i installed it my screen went black and i couldn’t turn my phone on. do not ever get this app.
attributes.title: THE WORST APP ON THE APP STORE

attributes.review: We love Donald Trump so much we named our pet after him! It’s a very orange lizard named “Cheeto”, I think they have a lot in common. Unfortunately there are way too many disclaimers on this app, almost like if I join this “project” I’d be joining a cult. Weird, huh? I mean who does he think I am, someone who would wear a mask?!
attributes.title: Too many disclaimers

attributes.review: This app took days to download and would continue to make my phone glitch and no other apps did that. Every time I would click on the app it would shut my phone off overall just a terrible app don’t waist ur time
attributes.title: Horrible app
